    Jora Jobs Vacancies HR cum Laboratory Administrator

    November 18, 2020

    TOC

    • Job Description
    • Company Overview
    • How To Apply

    Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for HR cum Laboratory Administrator position. If you currently looking for new healthcare job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

    Job Description

    ABA Healthcare & Consultancy Sdn Bhd
    Job Description
    • Make sure all the consumables items are up-to date in inventory
    • Make sure all the documentation is in neatly-manner
    • Assists with the requirements of ISO 15189 requirements
    • Create PO/DO/Invoice/quotation as requested
    • Proactive
    • Deal with cleaner for ensuring the cleanleness of the lab.
    • Record all the transactions of the suppliers and customers in the list. For future monitoring
    • Liased with vendor and supplier for equipment inspection and certification
    • Assist sales and marketing department
    • Assists MLT for lab items ordering and get approval from Lab. Manager.
    • Able to do simple finance administration
    • Do payroll for salary every month and submit to finance
    • Have experience for EPF, EIS and Socso contribution via their website. Avoid any penalties
    • Monitoring staff attendance for OT

    Company Overview

    Who are we?
    Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
    Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
    This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
    Your application will be redirected to them.

    How To Apply

    If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
    Hope you find your dream hospital job in Kuala Lumpur.
    Apply Online
